structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Declaration of policy of KRS 96.910 to 96.927.
law.text: The public health, safety and welfare require that new and alternative measures be authorized to encourage, promote, and make more feasible the provision of facilities for the collection, treatment, and disposal of sewage by cities, by sewer service charges established with due consideration for cost of necessary new or additional facilities, benefits received and to be received, and approximate ultimate equality of financial burden.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 2, effective June 19, 1958.
